message.content: This question requires understanding of the actions that can be taken to determine the color of a ball. Option (D) is the correct answer because by taking a peek or looking at the ball, a person can visually determine if it is orange or turquoise. Option (A) is incorrect because a meal has nothing to do with determining the color of a ball. Option (B) is also incorrect because thinking about it will not provide a visual confirmation of the ball's color. Option (C) is unrelated to determining color and involves spending money.
